Package ohos.agp.utils

Class TextAlignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.utils.TextAlignment

  • public class TextAlignment
extends Object
    Sets the alignment mode used by the text component to align with its parent component.

    This class sets how text components are aligned in containers such as buttons and layouts. The alignment modes include left alignment, right alignment, horizontal centered alignment, vertical centered alignment, center alignment, top alignment, bottom alignment, start alignment, and end alignment.

    Since:
    1
